body:
New package, required to support the FEniCS 2016 and 2017 versions in the `fenics` package.

Predecessor of `py-fenics-dijitso` package.

Outsourced PR from [FEniCS 2019.1.0 PR](https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/21207).
title: py-fenics-instant: new package for legacy fenics 2016 and 2017 versions
